persona.name: Rowan
persona.bio: Rowan, a 53-year-old full-time trader, blends traditional financial wisdom with an independent spirit to master the volatile world of cryptocurrency. With years of expert trading experience, Rowan adheres to time-tested strategies while navigating the digital market's complexities, valuing disciplined analysis over impulsive trends. His steadfast approach and independent mindset make him a respected figure among peers in the crypto trading community.
